import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Set asset location"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/location"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an asset's location assignment to a specific building, room, or storage area. Can include free-text location details for desk or shelf placement.

**Prerequisites**
1. **AssetId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) to identify the asset and extract `Items[].AssetId`.
2. **LocationId** - Use [GET /api/v2.0/locations/all/\{siteId\}](/docs/api/locations/get-all-site-locations-v-2) to get valid location UUIDs.
3. **SiteId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/sites](/docs/api/sites/get-site-by-url) if operating across multiple sites.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for asset: [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) with tag or serial filter.
2. Get target location: [GET /api/v2.0/locations/all/\{siteId\}](/docs/api/locations/get-all-site-locations-v-2).
3. Submit [POST /api/v1.0/assets/location](/docs/api/assets/set-asset-location) with AssetId and LocationId.

**Minimal Required Fields**: AssetId, LocationId, SiteId

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request to update an asset's location","properties":{"AssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the asset to update"},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the new location. Obtain from GET /api/v1.0/locations."},"RoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the room within the location"},"LocationDetails":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Free-form text describing the specific location"},"UpdateAssetToOwnersLocation":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, update the asset to the owner's location","default":false},"Force":{"type":"boolean","description":"Force the location change even on read-only assets","default":false}},"required":["AssetId","LocationId"],"title":"SetAssetLocationRequest"},"example":{"AssetId":"11111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555","LocationId":"2bd1574a-2243-e611-a93b-a45e60e682da","RoomId":null,"LocationDetails":"Room 101, Desk 5","UpdateAssetToOwnersLocation":false,"Force":false}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
